text: Martin John O'Neill, Baron O'Neill of Clackmannan (6 January 1945 – 26 August 2020) was a Scottish Labour politician. He was a Member of Parliament from 1979 until 2005 and as a member of the House of Lords from 2005 until his death in 2020. He was in the Neil Kinnock Shadow Government between 1988 to 1992. O'Neill was born in Edinburgh. O'Neill died on 26 August 2020 in Edinburgh from cancer, aged 75.Deceased Lords ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:Politicians from Edinburgh Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Labour Life Peers
title: Martin O'Neill, Baron O'Neill of Clackmannan
